data.title: Why does Marcus get kicked off suite life on deck?
data.meta_description:
yes it did. he went to act in his own Broadway production,
inspired by his number one hit single: retainer baby.
data.text:
yes it did. he went to act in his own Broadway production, inspired by his number one hit single: retainer baby.

Is it true that Marcus is getting kicked off of the boat from the new episode from suite life on deck?

Marcus is getting kiced off the boat but hes going to continue his career as a singer

How old is Marcus from suite life on deck?

In 2011 right now I no hes 18 or 17 in the show but in real life he is 17.

What is deference of The suite life of Zack and Cody and The suite life on deck?

-On deck is a spinoff series -On deck excludes many of ZnC's characters -On deck takes place on a boat -On deck is set when London's father creates a tipton cruise ship with a high school and London, Zack, Cody are sent to it -Life with ZnC takes place in the Boston Tipton. -There are no more suite life episodes, only on deck -IT IS SPELLED "DIFFERENCE."
